package.description:
Some work-in-progress code to control Bioloid robot using ROS. This node + launchfile simulates a TypeA robot and allows experimentation with an IK solver to set joints.
Caveats: * Buggy * The urdf is innacurate - dimensions and servo axes are nowhere near exact
To run: roslaunch display.launch model:=TypeA.xacro gui:=True
